alert.note: Alert for Benton (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 21 at 8:38AM PST until December 21 at 5:34PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Portland OR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oregon... Marys River near Philomath affecting Benton County. For the Willamette River Tributaries...including Philomath...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Marys River near Philomath. * WHEN...From this morning to late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Above 20.5 feet, expect continued flooding of several roads in the vicinity of Philomath, including Bellfountain Road, Chapel Drive, and Fern Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM PST Tuesday the stage was 20.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 AM PST Tuesday was 21.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to about 17.0 feet by Wednesday night. It will likely remain between 17.0 and 18.0 feet through Friday. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 545 PM PST.
